content.question: The polynomial function <math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> is given by <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals x open parentheses x squared minus 9 close parentheses"><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mi>x</mi><mfenced><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>-</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>. What are all intervals on which <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses less than 0"><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo><</mo><mn>0</mn></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="open parentheses negative infinity comma negative 3 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mo>∞</mo><mo>,</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfenced></math> and <math alttext="open parentheses 0 comma 3 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>

<math alttext="open parentheses negative infinity comma negative 3 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mo>∞</mo><mo>,</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfenced></math> and <math alttext="open parentheses 3 comma infinity close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>∞</mo></mrow></mfenced></math>

<math alttext="open parentheses negative 3 comma 0 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mfenced></math> and <math alttext="open parentheses 3 comma infinity close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>∞</mo></mrow></mfenced></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="open parentheses negative infinity comma negative 3 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mo>∞</mo><mo>,</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfenced></math> and <math alttext="open parentheses 0 comma 3 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Solve equations and inequalities represented analytically, with and without technology.
